description: Returns information about reactions to a specified comment ID. Reactions from users who have been deleted will not be included in the count.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment for which you want to get reactions information.

nested_items.name: reactionsForComment
nested_items.description: An array of reactions to the specified comment.

nested_items.name: emoji
nested_items.description: The Emoji Version 1.0 graphic of the reaction. These graphics are interpreted slightly differently on different operating systems.

nested_items.name: shortCode
nested_items.description: The emoji short code for the reaction. Short codes are interpreted slightly differently on different operating systems.

nested_items.name: unicode
nested_items.description: The Unicode codepoint for the reaction.

nested_items.name: reactionUsers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of users who have provided reactions to the comment.

nested_items.name: reactionsFromDeletedUsersCount
nested_items.description: A numerical count of users who reacted with the specified emoji whose identities have been subsequently deleted from IAM. While these IAM users or roles no longer exist, the reactions might still appear in total reaction counts.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that can be used in a request to return the next batch of the results.
